need Help with that Final EssayThe Healey Library is holding workshops on research tips for all students in the Center for Library Instruction on the fourth floor PERIOD They are offering four workshops on Search Tips on Nov PERIOD  Nov PERIOD  Dec PERIOD  and Dec PERIOD  and one on Nursing and Allied Health Research on Nov PERIOD  PERIOD They are holding Dropin clinics for people who need oneonone help with a research project as well PERIOD These started on Nov PERIOD  and are scheduled on different days until Dec PERIOD  PERIOD For more information visit the Healey Web site at www.lib.umb.edu PERIOD

Multicultural Harvest FestivalThe Interfaith Campus Ministry is holding Multicultural Harvest Festival and SpeakaWord Coffee House Open Mic on Nov PERIOD  from  p.m PERIOD in the Ryan Lounge on the third floor of McCormack PERIOD Food will be available and students displaying talents in spoken word free verse vocals dance drumming instrumental and more will be performing PERIOD For more information call  PERIOD

Free Movie on CampusAs part of SAECs Movie Night Series they are showing The Bourne Ultimatum on Nov PERIOD  and Nov PERIOD  from  to  p.m PERIOD in the Campus Center game room PERIOD On Nov PERIOD  and  Pans Labyrinth will be shown in the Campus Centers third floor ballroom section C from  to  p.m PERIOD

If Youve Ever Wanted a Chance at an Amazon Gift Card..The Healey Library wants all students to take a survey on LibQual to help improve the librarys services PERIOD The survey which takes about  minutes to complete is online until Nov PERIOD  and those who participate are entered in an oncampus drawing for a  gift certificate for Amazon.com or one of two  gift certificates PERIOD Emails went out to students on Oct PERIOD  and a link to the survey is available on the UMass Boston Web site PERIOD

Because Facebook MySpace and Friends or Enemies Just isnt Enough..Capazoo another social networking Web site launched on Oct PERIOD  PERIOD Their selling point is that they offer a business model that allows users to earn Zoops or Capazoo points that can be converted into real cash PERIOD Basic membership is free and membership can be upgraded for an annual fee PERIOD For more information visit www.capazoo.com PERIOD

UMass Bostons independent studentrun newspaper
